hotel_important_information_with_codes.phrase: This property does not accommodate bachelor(ette) or similar parties.

cribs_and_extra_beds.text: The price in IDR has been converted to show you the approximate price in USD.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
The maximum number of cribs, extra beds, and children allowed in existing beds can vary depending on the option booked.
All cribs and extra beds are subject to availability.

children_at_the_property.text: Children of all ages are welcome.
To see correct prices and occupancy info, add the number and ages of children in your group to your search.

1386703901.description: This villa's special feature is the private pool. The air-conditioned villa has 1 bedroom and 3 bathrooms with a bath and a shower. The villa's kitchen, which features a stovetop and a refrigerator, is available for cooking and storing food. Boasting a balcony with garden views, this villa also offers a tea and coffee maker and a flat-screen TV with streaming services. The unit has 1 bed.

cancellation.description: Note that if canceled, modified, or in case of no-show, the total price of the reservation will be charged.

prepayment.description: You'll be charged a prepayment of the total price at any time.

policies.content: If you cancel, modify the booking, or don't show up, the fee will be the total price of the reservation.
The total price of the reservation is charged at the time of booking.
You won't be eligible for a refund if you cancel this booking.
